meta.description: SWSE Store Marketplace Experiential Service Reviews
meta.notes: First-person, experiential reviews of services without naming vendors or service tiers.

dining: This dining experience was more about presentation than food.
I ate well, but it took longer than expected.
The meal filled me up, which was the goal.
This place focused more on atmosphere than flavor.
I left satisfied, but not impressed.
The food was fine, the wait was not.
Everything looked better than it tasted.
I enjoyed the meal, but wouldn't go out of my way for it.
The experience depended heavily on who was working that day.
lodging: This lodging experience looked great at first, then problems appeared.
I slept comfortably, which is all I needed.
The room was clean, but smaller than expected.
This place felt quiet but impersonal.
I stayed the night without incident.
This lodging experience had unexpected charges.
The room met expectations, nothing more.
I didn't spend much time there, thankfully.
Sleeping was possible, but relaxing was harder.
medicalCare: This medical service solved the problem, but explanations were minimal.
The staff focused on efficiency, not comfort.
This experience felt rushed but effective.
I recovered, which seems like success.
The procedure worked, though it was uncomfortable.
I wasn't told much before it started.
The results were good, the process less so.
I left with fewer problems than I arrived with.
transportation: This transportation experience got me where I needed to go.
The trip was uneventful, which I appreciated.
This ride took longer than advertised.
The journey was smooth until the end.
This transportation experience depended heavily on timing.
I would use this again if necessary.
upkeep: This upkeep service made things easier for a while.
Maintaining this lifestyle took more effort than expected.
This upkeep experience had hidden complications.
Things ran smoothly after this was handled.
The service simplified some problems and created others.
vehicleRental: This vehicle rental worked as expected.
The vehicle handled fine for short trips.
This rental experience was stressful at times.
I returned the vehicle without issue.
This rental felt overpriced for the experience.
Driving it was easier than maintaining it.
This rental experience depended on how carefully it was used.
I would consider renting again if needed.
